H0.text: What company is the world's largest auction house. Sotheby's

H1.text: What company is the world's largest auction house. Bonhams

H2.text: What company is the world's largest auction house. Phillips

H3.text: What company is the world's largest auction house. Christy's

A4.text: In 2020, Sotheby's overtook Christie's as the world's top auction house for the first time since 2011, with over $5 billion in aggregate sales compared to its rival's $4.4 billion.
